title: foobar2000 Complete Encoder Pack v2
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Notes on release v2:

Included VC8 runtime libraries for systems that don't have them installed.
These libraries are needed to encode with ALAC and AAC (Apple).
In such cases, folder "Microsoft.VC80.CRT" should remain inside "tools" folder.
If your system already have them, you can safely delete folder "Microsoft.VC80.CRT"

Also included VC2008 runtime libraries installer (vcredist_x86.exe).
This is needed for AAC (Winamp FhG) encoder. Again, if your system already has it,
you don't need to install it.

If you don't know if your system has VC8 and VC2008 libraries installed, don't copy
folder "Microsoft.VC80.CRT" neither run "vcredist_x86.exe". Then, try to encode
with AAC (Apple) and AAC (Winamp FhG). If any of the encodes fail, you'll know you
need one or both libraries. If AAC (Apple) fails, you need folder
"Microsoft.VC80.CRT". If AAC (Winamp FhG) fails, you need to run vcredist_x86.exe.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This pack lets you use all the encoder presets bundled with foobar2000.
Copy all the files in "Tools" folder to a folder of your choice.
In my case, I created a "tools" folder directly below the foobar2000 program folder.
You don't need any other files other than the ones provided here.

When you perform the first conversion (no matter which encoder you use),
foobar2000 will prompt you for the location of the encoder executable.
Point to the folder where you stored the files. That's it!

The following encoders are provided:

AAC (Apple)
AAC (FDK)
AAC (Nero)
AAC (Winamp FhG)
Apple Lossless (ALAC)
FLAC
MP3 (LAME)
Musepack
Ogg Vorbis
Opus
WavPack

Note that, to use AAC (Apple) or ALAC you DON'T need to install iTunes or QuickTime.
All necessary files are provided. Similarly, you DON'T need to install Winamp in
order to use AAC (Winamp FhG).

List of files:

Microsoft.VC80.CRTMicrosoft.VC80.CRT.manifest
Microsoft.VC80.CRTmsvcp80.dll
Microsoft.VC80.CRTmsvcr80.dll
ASL.dll
CoreAudioToolbox.dll
CoreFoundation.dll
enc_fhgaac.dll
fdkaac.exe
fhgaacenc.exe
flac.exe
icudt46.dll
icuin40.dll
icuuc40.dll
lame.exe
libdispatch.dll
libicuin.dll
libicuuc.dll
libmp4v2.dll
mpcenc.exe
neroAacEnc.exe
nsutil.dll
objc.dll
oggenc2.exe
opusenc.exe
pthreadVC2.dll
qaac.exe
wavpack.exe
